Company: Louisiana Horsemen's Benevolent and Protective Association (HBPA)
Description of incident: A former employee admitted that she conspired with others to send fraudulent votes.  The woman falsified election ballots for members unlikely to vote, enclosed them in envelopes and marked the envelopes with the members' Social Security numbers.  The purpose was to rig the outcome of the 2008 March HBPA election.
